reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress chic and well-made, with soft, high-quality fabric that's not too heavy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Style
items.body: This fit is perfect. I had so many compliments on the dress. Great quality and soft material. It allowed me to be comfortable in all day meetings and look stylish. Read more
items.author: Tina C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Class
items.body: Fantastic dress and feel. Very soft sweater material especially for those who have sensitive skin. Elegant look where the wrap hides tummy concerns while allowing to show off your curves in a respectable manner as the material hugs your curves. The material is quite stretchy and keeps you warm in the winter. True to size. I hope you enjoy it as much as I have been. I have gotten lots of compliments in the office and out while at dinner with my husband. Read more
items.author: John F Norton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweat dress
items.body: The Long Sleeve High Neck maroon/burgundy Sweater Dress is absolutely stunning! The color is beautiful, and the material feels high-quality and soft. It fits very well and looks flattering, but for me, it’s a bit too snug for my comfort. If you enjoy a more form-fitting style, this dress is a great choice — elegant and well-made. Personally, I prefer something with a little more room to move, but overall, it’s a lovely piece. Read more
items.author: Kimberly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classy Sweater Dress-color block belt makes it!
items.body: Awesome sweater dress-light weight, but does does not look or feel cheap. Fits like a glove and true to size. I'm on the petite/shorter side 5'1 and it falls a bit below my calf, so can pair with boots or heels! Great price point for this dress. Read more
items.author: stacey a wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy
items.body: Really pretty. Perfect sized, not to heavy, Sophisticated! Was very wrinkled but easily taken care of. 133, I got the large. Hides my stomach. Excellent for the cost! Fits but not clingy! Love the dress. Read more
items.author: Nickki

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many compliments!
items.body: Got this for a work trip to a colder climate and didn’t want to spend a lot of money because I live in Florida and don’t need winter work clothes. It’s adorable!! I received sooooo many compliments on this dress-I was surprised how many people noticed it. Definitely worth the money! It’s not too light and not too heavy so I was very comfortable in an overly air conditioned meeting room. Great quality and true to size. Read more
items.author: Oakley14

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Fits perfect! I absolutely love this dress, well made a comfortable and very classy. Read more
items.author: Received this yesterday. So soft and fits perfect and I highly recommend.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but..
items.body: Fit perfectly BUT. The first time I tied the sash it came unraveled. Pulling apart. I wore it anyway I didn’t have another to wear in such short notice Read more
items.author: Todd&Kelli Stafford

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Beige, Burgundy, Olive Green, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
